title: [EUW][S][Diamond] Team Looking for jungle/Top Player
body:
Hey,

we are a relatively new team that has been playing for about 3 weeks now and we are looking for a jungle/top player. Our goal is to compete in tournaments, scrim versus other teams of similar elo, and possibly travel to LANs in Central Europe.

Our requirements are as follows:

18+ SoloQ rank of Diamond Good understanding of the game, Champion pool fitting the meta Fluent in English or prefered German, Team-compatible, positive attitude, able to take criticism Be able and willing to play at least 3 sets of 2 - 3 hour sets a week If you are interested, add scilyfe on the League client.
